CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Bill_To_Name__c),'',Bill_To_Name__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Bill_To_Address_Line_1__c),'',Bill_To_Address_Line_1__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Bill_To_Address_Line_2__c),'',Bill_To_Address_Line_2__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Bill_To_Address_Line_3__c),'',Bill_To_Address_Line_3__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Bill_To_Address_Line_4__c),'',Bill_To_Address_Line_4__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Bill_To_City__c),'',Bill_To_City__c & ', ') & Bill_To_Province__c & ' ' & Bill_To_Postal_Code__c
CustomField.label: Sold To
